exceptions.tactic: intros h st t candidate lli llt st' m H1 H2 H3.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
lltsi: leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface
llsi: leaderLogs_sorted_interface
si: sorted_interface
llsli: leaderLogs_sublog_interface
llci: leaderLogs_contiguous_interface
taifoi: terms_and_indices_from_one_interface

Goal:
forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (candidate : fin N) (lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t candidate lli llt = (st', m) -> ~ is_append_entries m

Premises:
term = nat : Set
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
Record sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_sorted_interface { handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p =
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
fin = fix fin (n : nat) : Type := match n with | 0 => False | S n' => option (fin n') end : nat -> Type Arguments fin _%nat_scope
data = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (data, _, _) := BaseParams0 in data : BaseParams -> Type Arguments data {BaseParams}
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
clientId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (_, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in clientId : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments clientId {orig_base_params RaftParams}
handleRequestVote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) (state : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (candidateId : fin N) (lastLogIndex lastLogTerm : nat) => if t <? currentTerm state then (state, RequestVoteReply (currentTerm state) false) else let state0 := advanceCurrentTerm state t in if (if leaderId state0 then false else true) && moreUpToDate lastLogTerm lastLogIndex (maxTerm (log state0)) (maxIndex (log state0)) then match votedFor state0 with | Some candidateId
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record leaderLogs_sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_sorted_interface { leaderLogs_sorted_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_sorted net } Arguments leaderLogs_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record leaderLogs_sublog_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_sublog_interface { leaderLogs_sublog_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_sublog net } Arguments leaderLogs_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record log_matching_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_log_matching_interface { log_matching_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> log_matching net } Arguments log_matching_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_log_matching_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
logIndex = nat : Set
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface { leaderLogs_term_sanity_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_term_sanity net; leaderLogs_currentTerm_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity net; leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate net } Arguments leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface {orig_base
Inductive serverType : Set := Follower : serverType | Candidate : serverType | Leader : serverType
N = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (N, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> nat Arguments N {orig_base_params RaftParams}
Record leaderLogs_contiguous_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_contiguous_interface { leaderLogs_contiguous_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_contiguous net } Arguments leaderLogs_contiguous_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_contiguous_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%list_scope
Record terms_and_indices_from_one_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_interface { terms_and_indices_from_one_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_vwl net /\ terms_and_indices_from_one_ll net } Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
handleRequestVote_log : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (candidate : fin N) (lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t candidate lli llt = (st', m) -> log st' = log st
handleRequestVote_no_append_entries : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', m) -> ~ is_append_entries m
handleRequestVote_currentTerm : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', m) -> currentTerm st <= currentTerm st'
handleRequestVote_type : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', m) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower
handleRequestVote_type_term : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', m) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower /\ currentTerm st' >= currentTerm st
votes_update_elections_data_request_vote_intro_old : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (src : fin N) (lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg) (t' : term) (h' : name), handleRequestVote h (snd st) t src lli llt = (st', m) -> In (t', h') (votes (fst st)) -> In (t', h') (votes (update_elections_data_requestVote h src t src lli llt st))
handleRequestVote_cases : forall (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', m) -> st' = st \/ st' = advanceCurrentTerm st t \/ st' = RaftState.set_raft_data_votedFor term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (advanceCurrentTerm st t) (Some h') /\ (votedFor st = None /\ currentTerm st = t \/ currentTerm st < t)
handleRequestVote_reply_true' : forall (h : name) (h' : fin N) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (t' : term), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', RequestVoteReply t' true) -> t' = t /\ currentTerm st' = t
handleRequestVote_currentTerm_monotonic : forall (pDst : name) (t : nat) (cid : fin N) (lli llt : nat) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (d' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote pDst d t cid lli llt = (d', m) -> currentTerm d <= currentTerm d'
handleRequestVote_reply_true : forall (h : name) (h' : fin N) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (t' : term), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', RequestVoteReply t' true) -> votedFor st' = Some h' /\ currentTerm st' = t'
votes_update_elections_data_request_vote_intro : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (src : fin N) (lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg) (h' : name), handleRequestVote h (snd st) t src lli llt = (st', m) -> votedFor st' = Some h' -> currentTerm (snd st) < currentTerm st' \/ votedFor (snd st) = None -> In (currentTerm st', h') (votes (update_elections_data_requestVote h src t src lli llt st))
handleRequestVote_votesReceived : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t c li lt = (st', m) -> votesReceived st' = votesReceived st
votes_update_elections_data_request_vote : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (src : fin N) (lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg) (t' : term) (h' : name), handleRequestVote h (snd st) t src lli llt = (st', m) -> In (t', h') (votes (update_elections_data_requestVote h src t src lli llt st)) -> In (t', h') (votes (fst st)) \/ t' = currentTerm st' /\ votedFor st' = Some h'
votesWithLog_update_elections_data_request_vote : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (src : fin N) (lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg) (t' : term) (h' : name) (l' : list entry), handleRequestVote h (snd st) t src lli llt = (st', m) -> In (t', h', l') (votesWithLog (update_elections_data_requestVote h src t src lli llt st)) -> In (t', h', l') (votesWithLog (fst st)) \/ t' = currentTerm st' /\ l' = log st'
handleRequestVote_votedFor : forall (pDst : name) (t : nat) (cid : fin N) (lli llt : nat) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (d' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote pDst d t cid lli llt = (d', m) -> currentTerm d = currentTerm d' -> votedFor d = None \/ votedFor d = votedFor d'
handleRequestVote_currentTerm_leaderId : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt0 : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t c li lt0 = (st', m) -> currentTerm st < currentTerm st' \/ currentTerm st = currentTerm st' /\ leaderId st' = leaderId st
handleRequestVote_log_term_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t c li lt = (st', m) -> log st' = log st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' = Follower
leaderLogs_update_elections_data_requestVote : forall (h src : name) (t : nat) (ci : fin N) (lli llt : nat) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), leaderLogs (update_elections_data_requestVote h src t ci lli llt st) = leaderLogs (fst st)
update_elections_data_request_vote_votedFor : forall (h : name) (h' : fin N) (cid : name) (t lli llt : nat) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h (snd st) t h' lli llt = (st', m) ->...-> votedFor (snd st) = Some cid /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm (snd st) \/ cid = h' /\ currentTerm st' = t /\ votesWithLog (update_elections_data_requestVote h h' t h' lli llt st) = (currentTerm st', cid, log st') :: votesWithLog (fst st) /\ moreUpToDate llt lli (maxTerm (log st')) (maxIndex (log st')) = true
handleRequestVote_currentTerm_votedFor : forall (pDst : name) (t : nat) (cid : fin N) (lli llt : nat) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (d' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote pDst d t cid lli llt = (d', m) -> currentTerm d < currentTerm d' \/ currentTerm d = currentTerm d' /\ votedFor d = None \/ currentTerm d = currentTerm d' /\ votedFor d = votedFor d'
handleRequestVote_matchIndex_preserved : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (ms : msg), handleRequestVote n st t c li lt = (st', ms) -> matchIndex_preserved st st'
handleRequestVote_stateMachine : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (ms : msg), handleRequestVote n st t c li lt = (st', ms) -> stateMachine st' = stateMachine st
handleRequestVote_clientCache : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (ms : msg), handleRequestVote n st t c li lt = (st', ms) -> clientCache st' = clientCache st
handleRequestVote_same_commitIndex : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (ms : msg), handleRequestVote n st t c li lt = (st', ms) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st
handleRequestVote_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (ms : msg), handleRequestVote n st t c li lt = (st', ms) -> log st' = log st
handleRequestVote_same_lastApplied : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (ms : msg), handleRequestVote n st t c li lt = (st', ms) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
update_elections_data_request_vote_votesWithLog_old : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (src : fin N) (lli llt : nat) (t' : term) (h' : name) (l' : list entry), In (t', h', l') (votesWithLog (fst st)) -> In (t', h', l') (votesWithLog (update_elections_data_requestVote h src t src lli llt st))
handleAppendEntries_not_append_entries : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> ~ is_append_entries m
handleTimeout_not_is_append_entries : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (st' : list raft_output * raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg), handleTimeout h st = (st', ms) -> In m ms -> ~ is_append_entries (snd m)
handleClientRequest_no_append_entries : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> In m ps -> ~ is_append_entries (snd m)
handleAppendEntries_doesn't_send_AE : forall (n : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (i : name) (l : logIndex) (t' : term) (l' : list entry) (l'' : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleAppendEntries n st t i l t' l' l'' = (st', m) -> ~ is_append_entries m
handleTimeout_packets : forall (h : name) (d : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg), handleTimeout h d = (out, d', ps) -> In m ps -> ~ is_append_entries (snd m)
refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : nat) (cid : name) (lli llt : nat), handleRequestVote (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_request_vote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : nat) (cid : name) (lli llt : nat), handleRequestVote (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) -> pBody p = RequestVote t cid lli llt -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : nat) (cid : name) (lli llt : nat), handleRequestVote (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
matchIndex_preserved = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (st st' : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) => type st' = Leader -> type st = Leader /\ matchIndex st' = matchIndex st /\ log st' = log st : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> Prop Arguments matchIndex_preserved {orig_base_params raft_params}
advanceCurrentTerm_same_lastApplied : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat), lastApplied (advanceCurrentTerm st t) = lastApplied st
advanceCurrentTerm_stateMachine : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat), stateMachine (advanceCurrentTerm st t) = stateMachine st
advanceCurrentTerm_same_log : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat), log (advanceCurrentTerm st t) = log st
advanceCurrentTerm_clientCache : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat), clientCache (advanceCurrentTerm st t) = clientCache st

```coq
intros h st t candidate lli llt st' m H1 H2 H3.
intro H.
apply (handleRequestVote_no_append_entries st h candidate t lli llt st' m H1).
congruence.
```

original: intros h st t candidate lli llt st' m H1 H2 H3. intro H. apply (handleRequestVote_no_append_entries st h candidate t lli llt st' m H1). congruence.
